title: C.R.E.A.M. Finance Polygon Pool Bootstrapping - Motion
body:
It is hereby motioned to consider to bring to a public vote the temporary bootstrapping of liquidity for the creation of a MTA pool on [C.R.E.A.M. Finance](https://cream.finance/) on [Polygon](https://polygon.technology/).

Providing liquidity will only be of a temporary nature, until a market has been established there, and the public forum request will come in the form of allocating x MTA for y months to the pool, after which the position will be withdrawn once again.

In terms of estimation of costs, $250k - 500k worth of MTA with a loan duration between 30-90 days were provided, and the proposal will be within this range for Meta Governors to ratify on.

**Should this motion be brought forward and shared as a public proposal on the mStable forum and snapshot page?**
author: 0x908DB31Ce01DC42c8B712f9156E969bc65023119
